scene_1.title: Tornado of Chaos
scene_1.description: Violent tornado of chaotic scribbles and papers swirling around child
sequence: (0-1s) Tornado intensifies, child spinning in center, papers flying everywhere
(1-2s) Parent slides across floor (action movie style), phone extended forward
(2-3s) Phone screen opens wide, VACUUM BEAM shoots out
(3-4s) Vacuum sucks scribbles toward phone, tornado fights back
(4-5s) Parent braces against pull, scribbles streaming into phone screen
(5-6s) Last scribbles WHOOSH into phone, tornado collapses
(6-7s) Clean organized homework appears on table from phone projection
(7-8s) Child catches breath, parent spins phone and pockets it
scene_1.phone_action: Industrial vacuum that sucks chaos into order
scene_1.core_message: Tornado chaos → Phone vacuums it → Clean solution

scene_2.title: Math Arrow Attack
scene_2.description: Math problems shooting at child like arrows from all directions
sequence: (0-1s) Child dodging arrows (equations), getting hit, overwhelmed
(1-2s) Parent LEAPS in front of child, phone held up as shield
(2-3s) Phone screen expands into GLOWING SHIELD, arrows bounce off
(3-4s) Arrows deflect into organized pattern, shield pulses with each block
(4-5s) Parent PUSHES shield forward, sends arrows flying backward
(5-6s) Arrows reorganize mid-air into solved equations
(6-7s) Solutions land gently on homework page as checkmarks
(7-8s) Shield dissolves, both in superhero landing pose
scene_2.phone_action: Energy shield that defends and reorganizes
scene_2.core_message: Under attack → Phone shields → Problems solved

scene_3.title: Fog of Confusion
scene_3.description: Thick fog of confusion fills room, child lost in darkness
sequence: (0-1s) Child wandering blind, hands out, bumping into things, fog everywhere
(1-2s) Parent kicks door open (dramatic), phone raised high
(2-3s) Phone screen EXPLODES with spotlight beam cutting through fog
(3-4s) Beam sweeps room like lighthouse, fog retreats from light
(4-5s) Parent spins 360°, phone light burns away all fog
(5-6s) Room now clear, revealed homework path glowing on floor
(6-7s) Child follows light path, confidently walks to answer
(7-8s) Phone dims, mission accomplished, fist bump
scene_3.phone_action: Powerful searchlight that burns away confusion
scene_3.core_message: Lost in fog → Phone illuminates → Clear path forward

scene_4.title: Magnetic Order
scene_4.description: Homework scattered everywhere, toys flying, total disaster zone
sequence: (0-1s) Child drowning in mess, papers flying past head, chaos spinning
(1-2s) Parent enters calmly, holds phone horizontal, eyes focused
(2-3s) Phone screen pulses, MAGNETIC FORCE ripples out visibly
(3-4s) All papers and problems SNAP toward phone, flying through air
(4-5s) Items orbit phone rapidly like planetary system
(5-6s) Phone SLAMS onto table, items organize in perfect grid
(6-7s) Child's eyes wide, everything suddenly perfectly arranged
(7-8s) Parent lifts phone, organized layout remains, thumbs up
scene_4.phone_action: Electromagnetic force that attracts and organizes chaos
scene_4.core_message: Scattered mess → Phone magnetizes → Perfect order

scene_5.title: Monster Under the Desk
scene_5.description: Giant homework monster made of crumpled papers terrorizing child
sequence: (0-1s) Paper monster growling, child backed into corner, terrified
(1-2s) Parent bursts through window (superhero entrance), phone glowing
(2-3s) Phone shoots LASER BEAM at monster, monster roars
(3-4s) Laser slices monster into pieces, papers scatter
(4-5s) Phone emits GOLDEN WAVE, paper pieces transform
(5-6s) Monster pieces become completed homework pages, floating down
(6-7s) Pages land perfectly stacked on desk, gold stars appearing
(7-8s) Child hugs parent, both look at phone triumphantly
scene_5.phone_action: Laser destroyer that transforms chaos into achievement
scene_5.core_message: Scary monster → Phone defeats it → Victory achieved
